doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 3 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 1/12/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 3 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 1/12/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Joyce Hunter, Darrell Yates Rist, and Evan Wolfson2. AIDS and the right to privacy, with special reference to public figuresCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine3. The media's ignoring gay-related news stories in their year-in-review issues, gay visibility4. Gay survivors of AIDS deaths, legal victories, and marriage rightsCOMMERCIAL: GCN's "Year in Review"5. Andy Humm on Reagan's lack of AIDS funding in 1987 budget6. New law forbids the Military from using HIV testing program for "adverse actions" against gay service members7. Denver, St John Episcopal Cathedral opens a housing complex exclusively for people with AIDS8. Tennessee, Tri-Cities AIDS project conduct awareness education9. San Francisco man successfully challenges his insurance company to gain health benefits10. Minnesota, governor issues executive order banning discrimination based on sexual orientation for state employees11. Lutheran Church of America encourages the welcoming of homosexuals as full members of their community12. Minneapolis, procurator for a male prostitution service charged with one year in a workhouse for exposing prostitutes to AIDS13. Sports Report, interview with bowler "Gutter George"14. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History, with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, clips from a show about witch doctors in South Africa dealing with AIDS3. Announcement of book, "Conversations with my Elders" by Boze Hadleigh4. Interview with Nicholas Deutsch, director of the off-Broadway play "Jerker"COMMERCIAL: Zamir Furs5. Show Bits with George Trahanis, review of the off-Broadway play "Groucho: A Life in Review"COMMERCIAL: The Monster6. Razor Sharp gives etiquette pointers for telephone sexCOMMERCIAL: TeleContractor phone sex hotline
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 3 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 1/12/1987]: January 1987
